New Records: Domantas Sabonis set a new Sac-era record for rebounds in a single game with 28 rebounds
Key Match Events: Domantas Sabonis recorded 23 points, 28 rebounds, and three assists
DeMar DeRozan scored half of his 24 points in the fourth quarter
Pre-Game Insights: Without De’Aaron Fox for the third straight night, the Kings got notable contributions from across the board
The Kings extended their win streak to six games with a 114-97 victory over the Boston Celtics
Post-Match Reflections: The Kings haven’t won seven consecutive games since November 9-22, 2022, when they introduced themselves to the rest of the NBA as the inaugural ‘Beam Team’
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kings held the high-powered Celtics offense to double-digits
Holding a Boston team that averages a league-high 49.8 three-point attempts per game to 11/41 from distance made all the difference
